posts.post_content: His first two abilities are just horrible. [Vindicate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vindicate) or improved [Threaten](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Threaten), every turn? Ouch. The final ability seems a bit swingy in application. Some decks will be absolutely crippled by it, others will barely notice it (and I note with some amusement GW decks will make up a notable chunk of the latter category). But that eight mana is fairly prohibitive... all in all I do think he's a good card. He just doesn't excite me into wanting to play him myself.
posts.html:
His first two abilities are just horrible. Vindicate or improved Threaten, every turn? Ouch. The final ability seems a bit swingy in application. Some decks will be absolutely crippled by it, others will barely notice it (and I note with some amusement GW decks will make up a notable chunk of the latter category). But that eight mana is fairly prohibitive... all in all I do think he's a good card. He just doesn't excite me into wanting to play him myself.
